solution_line_template: If one egg weighs {egg_weight_per_pound} of a pound then 1 pound will be made up of 1/({egg_weight_per_pound}) = {eggs_per_pound} eggs

One pound of eggs is {eggs_per_pound} eggs so {total_pounds_needed} pounds is {total_pounds_needed}*{eggs_per_pound} = <<{total_pounds_needed}*{eggs_per_pound}={total_eggs_needed}>>{total_eggs_needed} eggs
One dozen is {eggs_per_dozen} eggs so {total_eggs_needed} eggs will make {total_eggs_needed}/{eggs_per_dozen} = <<{total_eggs_needed}/{eggs_per_dozen}={total_dozens}>>{total_dozens} dozens
